overview: The Alan Ankles Experience is a mockumentary about a fictional artist, who gained notoriety and infamy in the art scene of New York in the 1980s. Alan leaves his home in Europe to make it big in the art world and to shape it to his own ideals. He becomes the art worldâ€™s villain and later vanishes from the scene to become an art cryptic much like a Bigfoot Banksy.
title: The Alan Ankles Experience
